Index.title: Green Card Eligibility Screener
Index.description: Answer a few questions to determine which U.S. green card category you may qualify for. Available in English and Chinese.

screener.title: Green Card Eligibility Screener
screener.description: Answer a few questions to determine which U.S. green card category you may qualify for. Available in English and Chinese.

questions.current_visa: Are you currently employed in the U.S. with a visa?
questions.education_level: What is your highest level of education?
questions.us_citizen_relative: Do you have any immediate relatives who are U.S. citizens?
questions.job_offer: Do you have a job offer from a U.S. employer?
questions.extraordinary_ability: Have you received national or international recognition for your achievements?
questions.work_experience: How many years of work experience do you have in your field?

results.confidence: Based on your responses, you may be eligible for {category} with {confidence}% confidence.
